name: Avocado Toast with Pickled Radishes
author: Munawar Ali
summary: This dish was truly the best breakfast I've had in a long time. A toasted slice of bread topped with soft avocado and the unique flavor of pickled radishes. Delicious.
directions: Bring vinegar, water, honey, and salt to a boil in a small saucepan
Put radishes, mustard seeds, black pepper, and bay leaf in a pint jar with a lid
Pour hot vinegar mixture over the radishes
Let the radishes come to room temperature
Cover with lid and place in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours
Mix coarse sea salt, furikake, and sesame seeds together in a small bowl to create the seasoning mix
Toast bread until lightly brown, about 2 minutes
Top each slice with half the avocado
Top avocado with a portion of the pickled radishes
Sprinkle half the seasoning mix over radishes
Place a small handful of cilantro on top
